notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was supported by Regione Lazio (L.R. 13/2008-Progetti di Gruppi di Ricerca; La Canapa industriale: sviluppo e valorizzazione di una nuova filiera agroalimentare ecosostenibile, CUP: B86C1800073002, protocol number 85201715069, Italy) and by MIUR FFABR2017 grants held by Rossella Grande. The experimental work was supported by the Abruzzo District project “Filiera Regionale delle Piante Officinali”. Antonella Di Sotto was supported by the “Enrico and Enrica Sovena Foundation”.
